# hasIRight

Javascript library

## Import web3

```html
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ethereum/web3.js@1.2.6/dist/web3.min.js"></script>
```

## Import dist or cdn

```html
<script src="./has_i_right.min.js"></script>
```

## How to use?

| Params    | Description          |
| --------- | -------------------- |
| `address` | NFT contract address |
| `tokenId` | NFT token ID         |
